title: IEEE DISCOVER 2016
description:
A​ technical​ conference,​ IEEE​ DISCOVER​ 2016,​ was​ held​ in​ NITK​ Surathkal​ on​ 13th-14th​ August,2016.​ This​ is​ one​ of​ the​ largest​ international​ conferences​ which​ was​ hosted​ in​ NITK,​ and​ is​ thus a​ great​ opportunity​ for​ our​ college​ and​ IEEE-NITK.
DISCOVER​ 2016​ attracted​ people​ working​ in​ diverse​ fields:​ Distributed​ Computing,​ Software Engineering,​ VLSI,​ Verification,​ Communication​ Engineering,​ Electrical​ and​ Electronic​ Circuits,and​ Robotics.​ With​ eminent​ speakers​ including​ professors​ from​ Northeastern​ University​ and Virginia​ Commonwealth​ University,​ USA,​ and​ the​ heads​ of​ successful​ startups,​ DISCOVER​ 2016 gave​ a​ great​ learning​ opportunity​ for​ all.
